page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: In the early 1950's our school, {St {John's}, had over 1000 pupils. There are now less than 200 on the roll. At the age of 12, pupils from our school transfer to {St Stephen's High School} in upper Port Glasgow. Recent years have seen a great expansion in educational opportunities for Port Glasgow people. The town can boast one nursery, eight primary, two six year comprehensive schools (both with rolls of about 1200) and an Adult Training Centre. Recently the non-denominational and Roman Catholic comprehensives have been working together in order to provide as wide a curriculum as possible for their senior pupils.
